items.a: It includes a complete assessment. The plan is delivered within 24–48h with clear goals.

profile.title: Meet the Professional
profile.name: Lic. Olmedo Leila
profile.bio:
Transforming your relationship with food for a fuller and healthier life.

As a Nutritionist, graduated with dedication from the Universidad de la Cuenca del Plata in 2022, my mission goes beyond restrictive diets. I firmly believe that nutritional education is the most powerful tool for lasting and positive change.

My professional focus specializes in areas where nutrition becomes a key pillar of quality of life:

Obesity and Weight Management: I guide you through a comprehensive habit-change process, addressing the multifactorial causes of excess weight. Together, we’ll design a personalized, realistic, and sustainable plan focused on your overall health and well-being, not just the scale.

Sports Nutrition: Whether you’re an elite athlete or just looking to optimize your gym performance, I create nutritional strategies adapted to your goals, helping you improve energy, endurance, and recovery.

Child Nutrition and Food Education: I am passionate about building a healthier future generation. I work with children and families to foster a positive relationship with food from childhood, with fun and educational plans tailored to each growth stage, addressing picky eating, childhood overweight, and more.

My Commitment to You:

My practice is based on active listening, empathy, and science. I use clear and approachable language, avoiding prohibitions and fostering autonomy. I believe that each person is unique, so your tastes, lifestyle, and goals will be the foundation of your nutrition plan.

I am here to guide, educate, and support you every step of the way toward a healthier and happier version of yourself.

Ready to begin? Let’s book a consultation and talk about your goals.
